current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: To authorize the Dry-Redwater Regional Water Authority System.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Dry-Redwater Regional Water Authority System Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Dry-Redwater Regional Water Authority System Act of 2014

text.#text:
This Act may be cited as
			 the

The purpose of this Act is to ensure a safe
			 and adequate municipal, rural, and industrial water supply for the
			 citizens
			 of—

Dawson, Garfield,
			 McCone, Prairie, and Richland Counties of the State; and

McKenzie County,
			 North Dakota.

The

The Water System shall be responsible for all non-Federal
			 transmission and distribution system delivery and service arrangements.

The
			 Water System shall be responsible for funding any transmission upgrades,
			 if
			 required, to the integrated system necessary to deliver power to the Water
			 System.
Nothing in this section exempts the Water System from the requirements of the

text.#text: Nothing in this Act—
preempts or affects any State water law; or

affects any authority of a State, as in effect on the date of enactment of this Act, to manage 
			 water resources within that State.
